alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Johnson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 28 at 4:15PM CDT until April 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON...SOUTHEASTERN TARRANT...NORTHWESTERN ELLIS AND DALLAS COUNTIES... At 414 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rendon, moving northeast at 45 mph. Half dollar size hail was reported in Keene. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington, Irving, Grand Prairie, Mesquite, Carrollton, Mansfield, Euless, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Burleson, Lancaster, Farmers Branch, Balch Springs, University Park, Midlothian, Addison and Crowley. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
